desc:
Since the credit amnesty last year, judgments may be removed by not only rescissions but with paid up letters from the credit providers as well. I need to spec a change to add â€œPaid up letterâ€ as a new reason on the system linked to wherever a rescission is a reason, for instance, judgment by default, judgment by consent etc.

I have spoken to dev and I require them to do a cursory investigation into what exactly need to be changed in the system to add this new reason. Once I have the go ahead and any information that they can provide, I can generate the spec document for the enhancement.

NB: This enhancement can also not go live until the bureaus have made the necessary changes to their systems to accommodate the new reason.
name: CW - CCW273 - Paid up Letter enhancement
